alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 06 at 2:34PM MST until December 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 5 PM THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 MPH with gusts up to 50 MPH expected. * WHERE...The Arco and Mud Lake Desert and Snake Plain, including but not limited to Craters of the Moon, Idaho National Laboratory, American Falls, Aberdeen, Pocatello, Chubbuck, Fort Hall, Blackfoot, Shelley, Idaho Falls, Ammon, Rigby, Rexburg, Sugar City, and St. Anthony. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 5 PM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Unsecured objects may be blown around.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects or bring them inside before the winds begin.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain
